DefaultDescription: Forged in magma - burns through anything
Molten blade that dismembers with burning precision
Digs through earth like it's butter - hot butter
Back to basics - like the old days
Simple digging - back when life was easier
Back when stone could cut - version 2.0 memories
Ancient farming tool - back to roots
How could I forget the old days, bro? :")

Enhanced version of the normal crossbow, designed for durability and sustained ranged attacks. Unlike the standard crossbow that fires a single bolt before reloading, the Repeat Crossbow features an 8-arrow magazine and progressive draw states, allowing continuous shots at distance. Compatible with multiple arrow types (Copper, Iron, Diamond, Explosive), each with distinct damage and effects. Automatic crossbow with 8-arrow magazine. Faster reload than normal crossbow but slightly less power.

Specialized bolt designed for the Repeat Crossbow, offering higher durability and distinct variants compared to normal arrows. Unlike standard bolts, Repeat Arrows are balanced for sustained ranged fire and optimized damage output. Available in multiple types such as Copper, Iron, Diamond, and Explosive, each variant provides unique power levels and effects. More durable than regular arrows and tailored for use with the Repeat Crossbowâ€™s 8-arrow magazine system.
